title: Replace Contact page with India Support Contact details

requirements.summary: Replace the /contact page by removing the existing form and showing only an "India Support Contact" section with the provided email and Instagram handle (no phone number).
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /contact shows a page with the heading "India Support Contact".
The page displays the email address exactly as: awarenessoveraddictionoffial@gmail.com.
The page displays the Instagram handle exactly as: awarenessoveraddictionofficial.
The email is a clickable mailto: link and the Instagram handle links to https://instagram.com/awarenessoveraddictionofficial (opens in a new tab).
No phone number is shown anywhere on the Contact page.
The previous contact form fields (Name, Email, Subject, Message) and submit button are removed from the Contact page.
User-facing text on the Contact page remains in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the current Contact Us/form UI with a single section titled "India Support Contact" that renders (1) a mailto link for awarenessoveraddictionoffial@gmail.com and (2) an external link (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer") to https://instagram.com/awarenessoveraddictionofficial displaying the handle awarenessoveraddictionofficial; remove all form state/handlers, the emergency disclaimer text, and any other content so the page does not show any phone number. Use existing shadcn-ui components already present in the file (e.g., Card/typography) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
